page.title: 17BERKELEY POWER STATION CLUB
page.content: The{Nuclear Sports and Social Club (NSSC) at the power station has a very {wide range of facilities.}They include badminton, bowls, clay pigeon shooting, cricket, darts, football, judo, karati, pool, skittles, snooker, table tennis, tennis and weight training. All these activities are open to members of the club and their guests, as is the club bar. More{public events}include cabaret with comedians and live bands, discos, dancing lessons and{charity}auctions which tend to support the local old people. {Occasional events}are also organised and these include horse shows, show jumping and model aircraft flying and displaying. The NSSC is a popular aspect of the power station which does try to reduce public pressure against nuclear power.
